dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDelimitedText2
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		rate_code,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_time_in_secs,
		trip_distance,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude
	)) ~> UserQueryDelimitedText2
